data.title: Top 10 Bollywood Movies shot in Kashmir

data.text:
This post features a list of the top 10 Bollywood movies shot in Kashmir, a picturesque valley in India. From romantic dramas to action-packed thrillers, these movies showcase the stunning beauty of Kashmir’s landscapes and culture. If you’re a movie buff or a travel enthusiast, don’t miss out on these must-watch films!

1. The Kashmir Files (2022)

“The Kashmir Files” is a must watch top 10 Bollywood movies shot in Kashmir based on true events that took place in Kashmir in the 1990s. Directed by Vivek Agnihotri, the film features Anupam Kher and Mithun Chakraborty in lead roles. The movie was extensively shot in various locations in Kashmir, including Srinagar, Pahalgam, and Gulmarg. Along with “The Kashmir Files,” Kashmir has also served as a stunning backdrop for many other Bollywood movies.

2. Haider (2014)

Directed by Vishal Bhardwaj and starring Shahid Kapoor, this adaptation of Shakespeare’s Hamlet is set in Kashmir during the 1990s. It is one of the most critically acclaimed movies shot in Kashmir, earning several awards and nominations. “Haider” undoubtedly secures its position in the list of “Top 10 Bollywood Movies shot in Kashmir”.

3. Jab Tak Hai Jaan (2012)

This romantic drama, directed by the legendary Yash Chopra, features Shah Rukh Khan, Katrina Kaif, and Anushka Sharma in lead roles is a superhit top 10 Bollywood movies shot in Kashmir. The movie was extensively shot in Kashmir, including the famous Dal Lake, and showcases the valley’s stunning natural beauty. It is definitely one of the must-watch films in the list of “Top 10 Bollywood Movies shot in Kashmir”.

4. Highway (2014)

This Imtiaz Ali movie was filmed in several locations in Kashmir, including Aru Valley, Pahalgam, and Srinagar. It stars Alia Bhatt and Randeep Hooda in lead roles.

5. Bajrangi Bhaijaan (2015)

This Kabir Khan directorial was shot in various locations in Kashmir, including Pahalgam, Sonmarg, and Srinagar. It features Salman Khan, Kareena Kapoor Khan, and Harshaali Malhotra in lead roles.

6. Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani (2013)

This romantic drama film directed by Ayan Mukerji was shot in Gulmarg, Pahalgam, and Srinagar. It stars Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone, Kalki Koechlin, and Aditya Roy Kapur.

7. Lamhaa (2010)

This movie directed by Rahul Dholakia was shot in various locations in Kashmir, including Pahalgam, Gulmarg, and Srinagar. It features Sanjay Dutt, Bipasha Basu, and Kunal Kapoor in lead roles.

8. Mission Kashmir (2000)

Starring Hrithik Roshan and Preity Zinta in lead roles, this action-packed thriller is set in Kashmir and portrays the political unrest and terrorism prevalent in the valley during the 1990s.

The movie was extensively shot in various locations in Kashmir and is one of the most popular movies shot in the valley, earning it a spot in the list of “Top 10 Bollywood Movies shot in Kashmir”.

9. Rockstar (2011)

This musical romantic drama film directed by Imtiaz Ali was shot in various locations in Kashmir, including Dal Lake, Pahalgam, and Srinagar. It stars Ranbir Kapoor and Nargis Fakhri in lead roles.

10. Kashmir Ki Kali (1964)

This classic Bollywood movie directed by Shakti Samanta was shot in various locations in Kashmir, including Gulmarg and Pahalgam. It features Shammi Kapoor and Sharmila Tagore in lead roles.

In conclusion, Kashmir is not only a beautiful travel destination but also a popular filming location for Bollywood movies. From romantic dramas to action-packed thrillers, the valley has served as a stunning backdrop for many acclaimed films. “The Kashmir Files,” “Haider,” “Jab Tak Hai Jaan,” and “Mission Kashmir” are just a few of the top movies shot in Kashmir that offer a glimpse into the valley’s stunning landscapes and rich culture. If you are a movie buff or a travel enthusiast, these must-watch films in the list of “Top 10 Bollywood Movies shot in Kashmir” are definitely worth adding to your watchlist.
